mapper.select: select s.*,m.memberCount from (select count(userid) memberCount from studyCourse where courseid in (select courseid from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid})) m, (select * from studyCourse where courseid in(select courseid from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid})) s where 10>rownum order by begintime desc
select * from userinfo where userid in (select userid from course where courseid=#{coueseid})

select * from (select st.*,u.uname,c.ctitle from studycourse st left join userinfo u on st.userid=u.userid left join course c on st.courseid=c.courseid where exists(select * from studycourse sc where sc.userid=u.userid and sc.courseid=#{courseid} ) order by st.begintime desc)a where 5>rownum
select count(*) from studyCourse where userid =#{userid} and courseid in (select courseid from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid})
select a.*,rownum rn from (select st.*,u.uname from studycourse st left join userinfo u on st.userid=u.userid where st.courseid=#{courseid} order by st.begintime desc)a where 12>=rownum
